app.name: Green City
auth.name: Name
auth.welcomeSignUp: Hello! Please enter your details to sign up.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.passwordMaxLength: Password must be less than 20 characters
auth.nameLength: Name must be between 2 and 30 characters
auth.emailInvalid: This is not a valid email
auth.registrationSuccess: Congratulations! You have successfully registered on the site. Please confirm your email address in the email box.
auth.signUpError: Failed to sign up. Please try again.
auth.signInError: Failed to sign in. Please check your credentials.
auth.googleSignInError: Failed to sign in with Google. Please try again.
homepage.header.caption: A new way to cultivate useful habits
homepage.header.content: People in Ukraine use an average of 500 disposable bags and 70 paper cups per year. It is as easy as bringing your own eco-bag and cup to save the lives of three dolphins or one turtle and keep the oceans clean for the next generation.
homepage.eco-news.title: Eco News
homepage.eco-news.error: Failed to load news. Please try again later.
homepage.eco-news.no-news: No news available at the moment.
homepage.subscription.caption: Receive interesting news
homepage.subscription.content: Subscribe for our newsletter and always be up to date with news and updates
homepage.subscription.validation-error: Please enter a valid email address
news.create.title: Create News
news.create.description:
Please provide as many details as you can - place and time of the event, the goal of gathering, etc.
You can come back and update news anytime after publishing.
news.create.titlePlaceholder: Example: Community Clean-up Event at Central Park
news.create.dropImageText: Drop your image here or browse
news.create.imageHint: Upload only PNG or JPG. File size must be less than 10MB
news.create.textPlaceholder: Enter a detailed description of your news or event. Include relevant information that would be helpful for readers.
news.create.textLengthHint: Must be minimum 20 and maximum 63,206 symbols.
news.create.sourceHint: Please add the link of original article/news/post. Link must start with http(s)://
news.create.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel? All your progress will be lost.
news.create.errors.submit: Failed to create news. Please try again.
news.create.errors.Title must be less th: Title must be less than 170 characters
news.create.errors.At least one tag must: At least one tag must be selected
news.create.errors.Main text must be at: Main text must be at least 20 characters
news.create.errors.Main text must be les: Main text must be less than 63,206 characters
news.create.errors.Invalid image type: Invalid image type. Only PNG and JPG are allowed
news.create.errors.Image size exceeds li: Image size exceeds the limit of 10MB
news.create.errors.Please submit or canc: Please submit or cancel the image before publishing
